What are the treatments for palmoplantar keratoderma with deafness ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of palmoplantar keratoderma with deafness:  - Foundation for Ichthyosis and Related Skin Types: Palmoplantar Keratodermas  - Genetic Testing Registry: Keratoderma palmoplantar deafness   These
